tags: Scores 1.0 if a known NIP-05 identifier resolves to the target pubkey (fixed nip05 string for deterministic planning).
content:
plan
  meta = do 'nostr.query' {kinds: [0], authors: [_.targetPubkey], limit: 1},
  nip05_res = do 'http.nip05_resolve' {nip05: '_@dergigi.com'}
in
let
  res = nip05_res,
  pubkey = fetch(res, .pubkey) | null
in
if lower(pubkey | '') == lower(_.targetPubkey) then 1.0 else 0.0
